Elections


  1. Office Closure


    Macomb Township Offices will be closed on Friday April 19 in observance of Good Friday.


  1. Household Hazardous Waste Day


    Macomb Township in conjunction with GFL will host a household hazardous waste day on May 4 from 9:00am - 1:00pm at Macomb Township Hall.  Located at 54111 Broughton Road. Macomb Township residents only.

    Click here for flyer.

  1. Parks and Recreation


    The Parks and Recreation Department is extremely proud of all our amenities as well as all the programs we offer to our residents. We continue to look for more park land and will strive to stay on the cutting edge of providing quality recreational opportunities for all ages.

    Recreation Website

  1. News & Events


    Stay up-to-date with the latest activities in Macomb Township

News Flash

  1. New CMPL North Branch Groundbreaking Event

    You’re invited to our groundbreaking event! Be a part of the start of our newest CMPL location (at 54100 Broughton Road next to Township Hall and Rec Center) on Saturday May 4 at 11:00am. Read on...

  2. Macomb Township News

    Short program with news and information for events in and around your community. Click here for link.

  3. CMPL Taste Of The Town

    Tickets are now available for the Clinton-Macomb Public Library’s 7th Taste Of The Town fundraising event at the Main Library from 6:30pm - 10:00pm on Friday, April 26. Tickets are $30 per person prior to the event or $40 at the door. Read on...

  4. Delinquent Water Penalty Notice

    The process of transferring delinquent balances to the winter tax bill will happen on October 31st of every year and be subject to a 15% transfer fee (this process is not reversible). Read on...

  5. Road maintenance including snow removal

    Residents who have questions about road maintenance including snow removal on their local roads must contact the Macomb County Road Commission at 586-463-8671. Read on...
View All
/CivicAlerts.aspx

Calendar of Events

  1. April 17

    Board of Trustees Workshop Meeting
    Read on...

  2. April 19

    Good Friday Closure Macomb Township Offices will be closed in observance of Good Friday on Friday April 19. Offices will re-open on Monday April 22 at 8:00am.
    Read on...

  3. April 24

    Board of Trustees Meeting Scheduled meeting of the Macomb Township Board of Trustees.
    Read on...

  4. May 2

    Zoning Board of Appeals Scheduled meeting of the Macomb Township Zoning Board of Appeals.
    Read on...

  5. May 4

    Spring Household Hazardous Waste Day Macomb Township in conjunction with GFL will host a household hazardous waste day for Township residents.
    Read on...

  6. May 4

    New CMPL North Branch Groundbreaking Event You’re invited to our groundbreaking event! Be a part of the start of our newest CMPL location (at 54100 Broughton Road next to Township Hall and Rec Center) on Saturday May 4 at 11:00am.
    Read on...
View All
